translation.en: Listen up, folks! New guys, can I have your ...
translation.es: Oigan. Los chicos nuevos, ¿me permiten su atención?

translation.en: Before you say anything, let me alert you to the fact
translation.es: Antes de que digas algo, quiero advertirte

translation.en: that we haven't been served water for over 12 hours. That's ridiculous.
translation.es: que no nos sirven agua desde hace más de 12 horas. Es ridículo.

translation.en: You'll get water afterwards. First some practical information.
translation.es: Después van a tener agua. - Antes, una información práctica. - Gracias.

translation.en: Thank you.
We'll be arriving home shortly. That will be a new experience for you.
translation.es: En breve llegaremos a casa y será una experiencia nueva para ustedes.

translation.en: None of you have ever been to Norway before.
You have?
No, I haven't been here.
But I have relatives up here, so I know the language.
translation.es: pero tengo parientes, por eso conozco el idioma.

translation.en: That's lucky. So we understand each other, then.
translation.es: Qué suerte. Así que nos entenderemos.

translation.en: Yes, I happen to have an extremely good ear for languages.
translation.es: Sí, es que tengo muy buen oído para los idiomas.

translation.en: - Like top class. World class. - That's amazing.
translation.es: Perfecto. De primera clase. Qué bien.

translation.en: Well, it's time for the ættestup. Anyone want to go first?
translation.es: Bueno, es hora del ættestup. ¿Alguien quiere ir primero?

translation.en: Bjørn, you're the oldest. Maybe you should take the first jump.
translation.es: Bjørn, eres el más viejo. Deberías saltar primero.

translation.en: Well, if someone else wants to jump, it's OK for me.
translation.es: Bueno, si otro quiere saltar antes, no me parece mal.

translation.en: Anyone else have the urge?
- No, no. - No, it's fine. Go ahead.
translation.es: - No. Que vaya Bjørn. - No, descuida. Ve tú.

translation.en: OK, fine.
If no one wants to jump, I can go.
translation.es: Si nadie quiere saltar, puedo hacerlo yo.

translation.en: It's a matter of honor, isn't it?
The ættestup is the most honorable thing you can do.
translation.es: El ættestup es la cosa más honorable que hay.

translation.en: Honor is really important, Bjørn.
translation.es: - El honor es importante, Bjørn. - Sí.

translation.en: Could you move a bit back there, give Bjørn some space?
translation.es: ¿Podrían moverse un poco para hacerle más lugar a Bjørn?

translation.en: See you on the other side.
See you.
To Valhalla!
Wow.
Well, anyway, you can expect to work hard up here.
translation.es: Como les decía, aquí se trabaja muy duro.

translation.en: But you'll have a chance to learn some new things and have some fun too.
translation.es: Pero tendrán la oportunidad de aprender cosas nuevas y de divertirse también.

translation.en: And I can almost guarantee that you'll make some new friends.
translation.es: Y casi puedo asegurarles que harán amigos.

translation.en: Excuse me?
- Yes, question? - What's the pay like? Is it good?
- It's not paid. - We won't get paid?
translation.es: - No hay paga. - ¿No nos pagarán? No.

translation.en: Not to complain, but I think the flow of information here on this boat
translation.es: No es por quejarme, pero la información en este barco fluye de un modo extremadamente arbitrario.

translation.en: is extremely arbitrary.
And that's totally uncalled for, when we're so crammed together in such a small craft.
translation.es: Es totalmente injustificado, siendo que estamos apiñados aquí.

translation.en: I didn't know until yesterday that we were even going to Norway.
translation.es: Apenas ayer me enteré de que íbamos a Noruega.

translation.en: So you think the information flow is under par?
translation.es: ¿El flujo de la información es insatisfactorio?

translation.en: Yes.
- So here's some information for you. - Finally!
translation.es: - Entonces, te daré una información. - Bueno, al fin.

translation.en: Did you see that? Did everyone see that?
There's something seriously wrong with my nose!
- Was that a bit too much? - No, you're the chieftain.
translation.es: ¿Me excedí un poco? No, eres el jefe del clan.

translation.en: Aren't you supposed to be a little like that when you're in charge?
translation.es: ¿No se supone que tienes que ser así para mandar? ¿Un poco loco?

translation.en: But it's not really me, that fear- based leadership style stuff.
translation.es: Pero no me interesa el estilo de liderazgo basado en el miedo.

translation.en: It doesn't feel right.
Can you be my witness?
Oddvar, maybe you want to go next?
I'm thinking, what's the worst thing that could happen -
translation.es: Estaba pensando, ¿qué es lo peor que podría pasarme

translation.en: - if I don't do the ættestup?
I mean, what's worse than being crushed?
translation.es: ¿Qué es peor que caer al vacío?

translation.en: I don't know. I was just ordered to take you up here. I mean,
translation.es: No lo sé. Solo me ordenaron traerlos aquí arriba. Ustedes tienen que saltar

translation.en: you're supposed to do the jump and spare your families
translation.es: Ustedes tienen que saltar y ahorrarles a sus familias la carga de mantenerlos en la vejez.

translation.en: the burden that is supporting you in your old age.
translation.es: y ahorrarles a sus familias la carga de mantenerlos en la vejez.

translation.en: Yeah, but I'm only 47. It's...
I mean, it's not that old.
I'm just going to skip the whole thing.
-- OK? - Yeah.
I'm not going to jump either. This is not my kind of thing.
translation.es: Yo tampoco saltaré. No me interesa.

translation.en: Anyone else want to jump?
- Come on, fellas. I mean ... - It's just not very tempting.
translation.es: - Vamos, muchachos. - Es que no es muy tentador.

translation.en: OK. I mean, I'm just a slave.
I can't make you do anything you don't want to do. But, uh...
translation.es: No puedo obligarlos a hacer algo que no quieran, pero…

translation.en: Could you just please stay away from Norheim?
So people don't understand that you didn't do the ættestup?
translation.es: para que la gente no note que no hicieron el ættestup?

translation.en: Of course, no problem. You'll never see us again.
translation.es: No hay problema. No volverás a vernos.

translation.en: Great. Thank you. Wonderful.
OK, bye!
Can't exactly say I'm looking forward to coming home now.
translation.es: No estoy precisamente ansioso por ir a casa.

translation.en: No?
My focus has always been on pillaging and ravaging and things like that.
translation.es: No, lo mío siempre fue el pillaje, la destrucción y esas cosas,

translation.en: When all the other guys have settled down with wives, kids, farms and stuff.
translation.es: cuando los demás se casan, tienen hijos, granja y todo.

translation.en: I'm feeling kind of alone here.
translation.es: Me siento un poco solo aquí.

translation.en: Yeah, but isn't that OK, too?
Do as you please. Do whatever you want. Without having to plan it three full moons ahead.
translation.es: Hacer lo que quieras, cuando quieras, sin tener que planearlo tres lunas antes.

translation.en: I live in a tent. The only clothes I have are the ones I'm wearing.
translation.es: Vivo en una tienda. La ropa que tengo es la que llevo puesta.

translation.en: I'm starting to feel a little pathetic here
We have to do something about that.
A good man like you shouldn't be alone if you don't want to.
translation.es: Un buen hombre como tú no debería estar solo.

translation.en: You have so much to offer!
No, not that much.
- I think I have a plan for that. - Really?
translation.es: Creo que tengo un plan. ¿En serio?

translation.en: A plan so crazy it might just work.
translation.es: Un plan tan loco que podría resultar.

translation.en: Wow!
Oh, it's you.
How did it go?
translation.es: ¿Cómo te fue? No volverás a ver a esos tipos, o sea que todo salió genial.

translation.en: You'll never see those guys again, so I would say it went great.
translation.es: No volverás a ver a esos tipos, o sea que todo salió genial.

translation.en: Good, good.
What is this?
- Hm? - So the rumors are true?
That you sent the old people in the village to their death?
translation.es: ¿Mandaste matar a los viejos de la aldea?

translation.en: Well, they took the ættestup.
You finally got the chance to run this village, Orm.
translation.es: Por fin logras tener la aldea a tu cargo, Orm.

translation.en: And the result is people are forced to throw themselves to their death
translation.es: ¿Y el resultado es que la gente debe arrojarse al vacío

translation.en: because we don't have any food?
What kind of leadership is that? Are you pleased with yourself?
translation.es: ¿Qué liderazgo es ese? ¿Estás conforme con lo que haces?

translation.en: I think things are starting to fall into place.
translation.es: Sí, creo que se nota una mejora.

translation.en: - Well I don't. - Well, then we have to agree to disagree.
translation.es: - Pues yo no lo creo. - Pues habrá que aceptar las diferencias,

translation.en: Which is something I've decided to start saying.
translation.es: que es algo que decidí empezar a decir.

translation.en: Chieftain Olav and his men should have been home from their raid over a month ago.
translation.es: El jefe Olav y su gente debieron volver de su incursión hace un mes.

translation.en: It's very strange that you haven't done anything to get them home.
translation.es: Es raro que no hayas intentado hacer algo por ellos.

translation.en: No, but all that stuff is up to Odin and the gods to decide.
translation.es: No, esas cosas las deciden Odín y los dioses.

translation.en: I mean, what am I supposed to do?
You could at least have sacrificed some slaves.
translation.es: Podríamos haber sacrificado a unos esclavos.

translation.en: Tried to be a little resourceful.
translation.es: Haber usado un poco el ingenio.

translation.en: Sacrifice? No, no, no, I don't think that's a good idea.
translation.es: ¿Sacrificio? No. No me parece buena idea.

translation.en: All that screaming and commotion...
translation.es: Tú sabes, todo ese griterío y escándalo…

translation.en: Your wife is also on that ship. You must be sick with worry.
translation.es: Tu esposa está en ese barco. Estarás preocupadísimo.

translation.en: No, yes, I am very sick with worry. For Frøya.
translation.es: No, sí, estoy preocupadísimo por Frøya.

translation.en: You know, it would be incredibly unfortunate if they didn't return home.
translation.es: Sería una desgracia si no volvieran a casa.

translation.en: I'd be left with permanent responsibility here and everything.
translation.es: Yo quedaría aquí como responsable para siempre.

translation.en: - Then you'd become chieftain. - Yes.
- Isn't that your big dream? - No, no.
I'm heir to the throne, but it's not like
translation.es: No, soy el heredero al trono, pero no es que sea mi sueño.

translation.en: it's my dream. No, I wouldn't say that.
translation.es: No, soy el heredero al trono, pero no es que sea mi sueño. No, yo no diría eso.

translation.en: Okay, then we'll sacrifice some slaves. OK?
No, I don't think so. That's pretty much what people are calling for right now.
translation.es: - No estoy de acuerdo. - Lo pide la gente.

translation.en: Are they? We're doing it, Orm.
Yes, well then I will make an executive decision, and say:
translation.es: Sí, pero entonces será mi decisión decir

translation.en: - That's what we'll do. - Great. Come on.
Odin, receive our second sacrifice!
Odin, receive our third sacrifice!
Bring our men home!
- Wait, wait just a second. - Yes?
Not to cock up your plans or anything but,
translation.es: No es por arruinar tu plan, pero ¿estás completamente segura de que es necesario sacrificarme?

translation.en: are you 100% certain that it's necessary to sacrifice me?
translation.es: pero ¿estás completamente segura de que es necesario sacrificarme?

translation.en: Yes. I mean, ritual sacrifice isn't a perfect science, but
translation.es: Sí. El sacrificio ritual no es una ciencia exacta, pero en este caso estoy muy segura.

translation.en: I feel really confident about this one.
translation.es: pero en este caso estoy muy segura.

translation.en: Okay, okay.
I just ... you've sacrificed two slaves already.
translation.es: Yo solo… Yo… Ya sacrificaron a dos esclavos. ¿No te preocupa que los dioses piensen que se excedieron?

translation.en: You're not worried the gods are gonna think that you're trying too hard?
translation.es: ¿No te preocupa que los dioses piensen que se excedieron?

translation.en: That it's too much?
translation.es: ¿Que es demasiado? Me gusta tu forma de pensar. No me malentiendas.

translation.en: Mm, I really like the way you're thinking. Don't get me wrong.
translation.es: Me gusta tu forma de pensar. No me malentiendas.

translation.en: I think it's great that you as a slave bother getting involved.
translation.es: Es genial que un esclavo se involucre. - Gracias. - Pero si no te molesta, seguiremos.

translation.en: But if you don't mind, I think we'll just move on.
translation.es: - Gracias. - Pero si no te molesta, seguiremos.

translation.en: - Oh, okay, of course. - Yes.
I just thought I'd mention it. No point in regretting it later. I mean...
translation.es: Tenía que decirlo. No vaya a ser que luego te arrepientas. El sacrificio no es precisamente reversible, ¿eh?

translation.en: Sacrifice isn't exactly reversible, but... Okay.
translation.es: El sacrificio no es precisamente reversible, ¿eh? Bueno.

translation.en: A ship!
They're coming!
Thank you, Odin. Thank you!
There you go.
Two sacrifices was enough. Should make a note of that.
translation.es: Dos sacrificios bastaban. Tengámoslo en cuenta.

translation.en: Hey, Frøya!
You can at least pretend to be happy to see your husband.
translation.es: Finge alegría de ver a tu esposo. Esto es vergonzante. Es algo incómodo.

translation.en: This is very embarrassing. Kind of awkward.
translation.es: Esto es vergonzante. Es algo incómodo.

translation.en: Holy Loki, it's good to see you, brother!
Look at you, all tan!
- Hi, Orm. - Hi.
So tell me! Where have you been? What have you done?
translation.es: Dime, ¿dónde has estado? ¿Qué has hecho? Tú sabes, ¿buenos recuerdos? ¿Algún momento especial?

translation.en: Any good stories? Any special moments?
Lots of special moments.
It wouldn't be fair to all the other moments if you should bring up just one.
translation.es: No sería justo con los otros momentos si solo mencionara uno,

translation.en: Because they were all so awesome. Oh, wow.
From we got there till we left,
it was just a series of one sweet moment after another.
translation.es: fue una serie de un momento entrañable tras otro.

translation.en: Lots of, you know, internal jokes and... You wouldn't get it anyway.
translation.es: Muchas bromas entre nosotros y… No lo entenderías.

translation.en: Next time I just have to join you.
translation.es: La próxima, iré con ustedes. Mi espalda estaba un poco… Pero ya estoy mejor. Mucho mejor.

translation.en: My back was a bit... But it's much better now.
translation.es: Mi espalda estaba un poco… Pero ya estoy mejor. Mucho mejor.

translation.en: - Mm- hmm. Yeah. - Much better.
translation.es: Mi espalda estaba un poco… Pero ya estoy mejor. Mucho mejor. Sí. Deberías estar orgulloso de tu esposa.

translation.en: You should be really proud of your wife.
translation.es: Sí. Deberías estar orgulloso de tu esposa.

translation.en: Frøya dove into that pillaging 100%.
translation.es: Frøya se comprometió totalmente con el pillaje. - ¿Sí? - Sí.

translation.en: Even took part in quite a lot of the raping.
Frøya forced all kinds of monks to let her ride them.
translation.es: Frøya abusó de todo tipo de monjes.

translation.en: I didn't really expect that. I was totally blown away
translation.es: No me lo esperaba. Me impresionó verla, de pronto, subida encima de un monje

translation.en: when I saw her on top of this monk, moaning and groaning.
translation.es: Me impresionó verla, de pronto, subida encima de un monje gimiendo y gruñendo. Basta.

translation.en: Did you do that, Frøya?
Of course. I mean, that's what you do when you pillage.
translation.es: Por supuesto. Es lo que se hace en los pillajes.

translation.en: That was kind of unnecessary, wasn't it?
If it's unnecessary? Well, yeah, maybe, but ...
If you joined a raid, you'd understand how the world works. Yeah.
translation.es: Si vinieras a una incursión, entenderías cómo funciona el mundo. Sí.

translation.en: Speaking of which, are you going to the party tonight?
Yeah, sure, aren't we all?
How about pounding some down tepid horns of mead at our place first?
translation.es: ¿Qué tal si bebemos unas aguamieles en casa antes de salir?

translation.en: Well, actually, all of us from the boat kind of agreed to get together before the party.
translation.es: Bueno, en realidad, con los del barco quedamos en juntarnos antes de la fiesta.

translation.en: Pour out some mead for our dead comrades, reminisce and stuff.
translation.es: A beber unas aguamieles por los camaradas muertos, rememorar y eso.

translation.en: Reminisce? You just got home a few moments ago.
We're not going to reminisce about the last moments on the boat,
translation.es: No vamos a recordar los últimos momentos. Vamos a recordar cuando empezó el pillaje.

translation.en: we're gonna reminisce about when we first got there.
translation.es: Vamos a recordar cuando empezó el pillaje.

translation.en: The first monastery we pillaged and stuff.
I understand, but it couldn't hurt if I was a fly on the wall, could it?
translation.es: Entonces no habrá problema si yo voy.

translation.en: You know, I can even bring my own chair.
translation.es: Puedo llevar mi propia silla, siempre dicen que no alcanzan.

translation.en: because you always say there aren't enough seats.
translation.es: Puedo llevar mi propia silla, siempre dicen que no alcanzan. Sí.

translation.en: Yeah, yeah, mm.
- I think It would get very crowded - Yeah. if people start bringing their own chairs, Orm.
translation.es: Creo que estaremos muy apiñados si la gente lleva su silla, Orm.

translation.en: Yes, yes, no, but I understand. But I can ...
translation.es: Sí. No. Entiendo. Pero puedo… Puedo quedarme afuera.

translation.en: I can, I can stand outside.
You know, and just talk to the guys who go to the toilet. And stuff like that, that would be OK, wouldn't it?
translation.es: Hablar con los chicos que van al baño. Eso estaría bien, ¿no?

translation.en: I think maybe I heard someone say:
translation.es: Creo que escuché a alguien decir: “Tres, dos, uno, no puede entrar ninguno”.

translation.en: - 3- 2- 1, no one else can come. - Yeah, that was Ragnar.
translation.es: Creo que escuché a alguien decir: “Tres, dos, uno, no puede entrar ninguno”. - Sí. - Sí. Fue Ragnar o Viljar.

translation.en: That's not runed in stone, is it?
translation.es: Pero no está escrito en runas. Runa o no runa, tienes que respetarlo.

translation.en: Stone or not stone, you have to respect it.
translation.es: Runa o no runa, tienes que respetarlo.

translation.en: Or else it doesn't mean anything.
You know, the whole rhyme would lose its magic.
It's going to be something people just say.
translation.es: Será algo que se dice porque sí.

translation.en: But, Orm, you know what?
We meet up in the great hall afterwards.
translation.es: Después nos veremos en el gran salón.

translation.en: - Yeah. - That's good. That's really good.
- Afterwards? - Yes.
After...?
OK...
OK.
Hello? Just one thing.
I had a cape with me on the ship.
translation.es: Yo tenía un manto en el barco.

translation.en: Er, er, it's more like a cloak, actually.
translation.es: Era más una capa, en realidad, pero sin botones hasta abajo.

translation.en: Just without the buttons all the way down. But anyway...
translation.es: Era más una capa, en realidad, pero sin botones hasta abajo. Se la di a uno de tus colegas que prometió regresármela

translation.en: I gave it to one of your colleagues who promised to return it.
translation.es: Se la di a uno de tus colegas que prometió regresármela

translation.en: When we reached our destination.
So, I don't know... maybe you can ask around for me? Or?
translation.es: Bueno, no sé. ¿Podrías preguntar en mi lugar o…?

translation.en: - Nope. Come here. - No?
Oh, there he is, there he is! Hi.
He's the one.
I'm the one who lent you my cape.
translation.es: Soy el que te prestó la capa.

translation.en: That's my cape.
This is mine.
- It's yours? - Yeah.
Well isn't that quite a coincidence,
translation.es: ¿No sería una coincidencia que tú y yo tuviéramos el mismo sastre en Roma?

translation.en: if you and I happen use the same tailor in Rome?
translation.es: que tú y yo tuviéramos el mismo sastre en Roma?

translation.en: And have the same family crest?
I doubt that quite strongly.
Well, that is the case.
Come on, not even you can believe that.
And you're wearing it all wrong. It's getting dirty.
translation.es: Te la pusiste mal. Está ensuciándose.

translation.en: You're wearing it like an amateur.
translation.es: - Es de amateur. - No te gusta la tierra.

translation.en: - You don't like dirt? - No. Who does?
- Open your mouth. - Excuse me?
Open your mouth. Don't bite.
- Whose cape is it? - Yours.
- It's my cape. - Yes.
Fast learner.
You're not gonna get away with...
Hey, you! Hi.
You're new, right?
We're gonna be strawmates. Kark is my name.
translation.es: Seremos compañeros de paja. Me llamo Kark.

translation.en: I was supposed to be sac...
I was supposed to be sacrificed today.
translation.es: Se supone que iban a sacrificarme hoy.

translation.en: But I got away, so they gave me a branding instead, just so I wouldn't feel too lucky.
translation.es: Pero me salvé y por eso me marcaron, para que no me sintiera afortunado.

translation.en: OK?
- Isn't it amazing? - No.
I'm gonna show you where we're gonna sleep. We're done, right?
Yeah, thanks, thanks.
Yeah, this is our spot.
Nice and warm among the animals.
- You're kidding, right? - No.
- I'm not sleeping in this pigsty! - What do you mean? This is sweet.
translation.es: - No dormiré en este chiquero. - ¿Cómo? Es excelente.

translation.en: Sweet?
What...
What kind of place are those goddamn inbreds running here?
translation.es: ¿Qué clase de vida llevan estos malditos endógamos?

translation.en: Seriously, you're not going to that pillage reunion, are you?
translation.es: En serio, no irás a esa reunión de pillaje, ¿verdad?

translation.en: Well of course I am.
Couldn't we take a mead here instead, you know, just the two of us, here, at home?
translation.es: ¿No podríamos beber aguamiel los dos solos aquí en casa?

translation.en: Uh, no.
In Loki's name, what's that around your neck?
Oh, this is a monk's necklace. It's like a trophy I made.
translation.es: Es un collar de monjes. Es como un trofeo que hice.

translation.en: Is that ... a cock necklace?
Mm- hm. From the monks.
Are those monks giants?
translation.es: ¿Son gigantes los monjes? Bueno, son tamaños completamente desproporcionados.

translation.en: These sizes are completely out of proportion.
Can you imagine, you know, getting hard with a tool like that? You'd be in trouble.
translation.es: ¿Te imaginas una erección con una herramienta así? Es un problema.

translation.en: Why? Because you'd just drop to the floor.
Your blood would go straight from your head to your tool.
translation.es: La sangre bajaría a la herramienta.

translation.en: You know, you would pass out completely.
No, usually they don't.
translation.es: Por lo que vi, no les pasa.

translation.en: Actually this is quite a standard size, I think.
translation.es: Este tamaño es bastante común, creo.

translation.en: I have exactly the same tool.
I think I know what a huge penis is. Those are abnormal.
translation.es: Reconozco un pene enorme, este es anormal.

translation.en: Yes. I'm going to go now.
I just feel sorry for those people who have to walk around with dicks like that. Yes, I'm going.
translation.es: Dan lástima las personas que tienen que andar con penes como ese.

translation.en: I feel sorry for them. What a handicap!
translation.es: Lo siento por ellos. Qué obstáculo.

translation.en: Friends. Brothers.
Warriors.
We're here to celebrate that Odin guided us safely home!
translation.es: Estamos aquí para celebrar que Odín nos ha guiado a salvo a casa.

translation.en: We're also here to celebrate that we found a way West.
translation.es: También hemos venido a celebrar que hallamos un camino al oeste,

translation.en: To a land that will see to it that we will never again have a lean year.
translation.es: una tierra que nos asegurará que no volveremos a pasar hambre,

translation.en: No matter how poorly the substitute chieftain
translation.es: por más terriblemente que el jefe suplente gobierne la aldea mientras no estoy.

translation.en: manages the village while I'm away.
translation.es: que el jefe suplente gobierne la aldea mientras no estoy.

translation.en: It's time to celebrate!
Shame on those who don't get drunk!
Yes?
- Great party. - Yeah.
I think my assicle has fallen asleep.
Those benches in there are so, so hard.
translation.es: Esos bancos son tan, pero tan duros. Al menos, podrían haber puesto unas pieles de animal.

translation.en: They could at least throw on a few animal skins.
translation.es: Al menos, podrían haber puesto unas pieles de animal.

translation.en: What do you mean?
The assicle falls asleep. The assicle goes numb. Straight away.
translation.es: El asículo se duerme. El asículo se entumece enseguida.

translation.en: - Assicle? - Assicle.
You don't know what the assicle is?
- Nope. - Assicle.
That little thing that sticks out between the penis and the hole?
translation.es: Esa cosita que sobresale entre el pene y el hoyo.

translation.en: On the... perineum?
That little thing that wags when you're excited?
translation.es: Esa cosita que se menea cuando te excitas.

translation.en: What do you call it?
- I don't know. - Well, I call it the assicle.
translation.es: - No sé. - Bueno, la llamo asículo.

translation.en: I don't know if that's the right word, or you know,
translation.es: No sé si es la palabra correcta o…

translation.en: but I call it that, I've always called it that.
translation.es: Pero la llamo así. Siempre la llamé así.

translation.en: So that's how it's gonna stay. OK, see you in there.
translation.es: Y así se quedará. Bueno, nos vemos dentro.

translation.en: Of course the horses didn't see the difference
translation.es: Por supuesto, los caballos no veían la diferencia

translation.en: between coltsfoot and dandelion.
translation.es: entre uña de caballo y diente de león.

translation.en: That was quite... peculiar.
Olvar. Liv.
Milady. That's how they greet
translation.es: Milady. Así se saluda a las mujeres bellas en Occidente.

translation.en: beautiful women in the West.
translation.es: Así se saluda a las mujeres bellas en Occidente.

translation.en: Wow. Impressive.
Welcome back from the raid. I heard you pillaged well.
translation.es: Bienvenido de la incursión. Supe que saqueaste bien.

translation.en: Yeah, it was ... It was really good.
translation.es: Sí, fue… Sí, estuvo muy bueno. Sí.

translation.en: Was there something in particular I could help you with?
Yes! Yes, there is one tiny... question.
- You still have that farm, don't you? - I do. Biggest one in Norheim.
translation.es: - Todavía tienes la granja, ¿verdad? - Sí. La más grande de Norheim.

translation.en: And... it's still going very well?
Oh, it's going good!
Yes, so that's what I wanted to talk to you about.
translation.es: Sí, de eso quería hablarte, porque sabes que me agradas.

translation.en: Because you know I dig you. I always have and always will.
translation.es: Sí, de eso quería hablarte, porque sabes que me agradas. Desde siempre.

translation.en: And I really admire you for what you have accomplished.
translation.es: Y realmente te admiro por lo que has logrado.

translation.en: Thank you, Arvid. That's great.
- Skål to Arvid! - Skål!
So I thought I'd challenge you to a holmgang.
translation.es: Por eso, se me ocurrió desafiarte a un holmgang.

translation.en: What?
Holmgang?!
Yes. And then the winner can take over the loser's
translation.es: Sí. El ganador se quedará con la propiedad, la esposa y todo lo del perdedor.

translation.en: property and wife and stuff.
translation.es: con la propiedad, la esposa y todo lo del perdedor.

translation.en: Because that's how the rules are, isn't it, Olav, Chieftain Olav?
translation.es: Porque así son las reglas, ¿verdad, Olav…? Jefe Olav.

translation.en: That's right. What you say there is right.
translation.es: Así es. Lo que dices es correcto.

translation.en: But you don't own anything, Arvid!
But that's how the rules are.
And it would be stupid of me not to take advantage of it.
translation.es: Y sería un estúpido si no las aprovechara.

translation.en: But I built up everything
with my own hands, from nothing!
translation.es: con mis propias manos y de la nada.

translation.en: Yeah. And I really respect you for that.
translation.es: Sí. Y te admiro por eso.

translation.en: But still...
I, Arvid, hereby challenge Olvar to a holmgang!
translation.es: Yo, Arvid, desafío a Olvar a un holmgang.

translation.en: Olvar?
Olvar?
Olvar?
Olvar, are you sitting here hiding?
I'm not hiding, I'm just thinking.
You can just forget about hiding.
If you don't show up for the holmgang you'll be deemed a niding. An outcast.
translation.es: Si no vas al holmgang, serás un niding, un paria.

translation.en: You'll bring shame on me, indirectly.
It's just that Arvid is so big. I mean...
translation.es: Es que Arvid es muy grande. Digo, él…

translation.en: He has been trained to be a warrior ever since he was a baby.
translation.es: Entrena para ser guerrero desde que era un bebé.

translation.en: And he has probably killed a thousand men.
translation.es: Y es probable que haya matado a mil hombres.

translation.en: I never touched a sword before today.
translation.es: Yo jamás toqué una espada antes de hoy.

translation.en: Blah, blah. Don't be so insanely defensive.
translation.es: Blablablá. No te pongas tan a la defensiva.

translation.en: You can beat him. It's all in the mind. It's 99% attitude.
translation.es: Tú puedes vencerlo. Está todo en la mente. Es 99 % actitud.

translation.en: - Is it? - Sure.
If you raise your game 5%,
and he lowers his 5%, most of the job is done.
translation.es: y él bajara un 5 %, gran parte del trabajo estaría hecho.

translation.en: Are the margins that - small? - Sure.
If you also look at the possibility of thinking a little outside the box,
translation.es: Y si además consideraras la posibilidad de pensar un poco más creativamente,

translation.en: anything could happen, right?
OK. Good luck. See you there.
translation.es: Bien. Buena suerte. Te veré ahí.

translation.en: Yeah. But, Liv, we...
- We go together.
No, I'm just going with some old friends.
translation.es: No, yo iré con unos amigos.

translation.en: What? What friends?
What? Who? Some old friends.
OK. Should I leave the door open?
Close it.
Good luck!
Olvar.
There you are. That was in the nick of time.
translation.es: Ahí estabas. Llegaste en el último minuto.

translation.en: You wish to exchange coins for poison?
Exactly. I got myself messed up in a holmgang over here.
translation.es: Exacto. Estoy metido en un holmgang.

translation.en: Give me your sword.
Don't send a sword over tip first.
translation.es: No pases la espada de punta.

translation.en: - Easy child's learning. - Sorry.
translation.es: - Hasta un niño lo sabe. - Perdón.

translation.en: This is the deadliest poison you can find.
translation.es: Es el veneno más mortal que hay.

translation.en: One scratch of his skin and he'll be dead in seconds.
translation.es: Un rasguño en la piel y caerá muerto en segundos.

translation.en: OK.
Thank you.
I will be forever in debt to you.
But you gave me money, so...
Yeah.
It's a figure of speech, isn't it?
- Yeah, I guess. - Yeah.
Bye.
Odin!
God of all warriors!
Today you will receive a new guest in Valhalla!
translation.es: ¡Hoy recibirás un nuevo huésped en Valhalla!

translation.en: Can I say something before we begin?
Yeah, that's fine.
Olvar will say a few words!
Many of you,
perhaps most of you,
don't believe I stand a chance here today.
translation.es: …piensan que no tengo ni una chance.

translation.en: And to you I will say
this:
Little strokes
fell great oaks.
That's it? Yeah?
Actually, I didn't get it, really.
What I mean to say, Arvid,
is that you will regret challenging me to this holmgang.
translation.es: es que lamentarás haberme desafiado a este holmgang.

translation.en: This is the dumbest thing you've ever done.
translation.es: Es la tontería más grande que has hecho jamás.

translation.en: Why do you say that? You have a secret weapon or something?
translation.es: ¿Por qué lo dices? ¿Tienes un arma secreta?

translation.en: This is the last thing I will say to you:
translation.es: Es lo último que te diré:

translation.en: The harder you come, the harder you... fall.
translation.es: Cuanto más duro pegas, más duro caes.

translation.en: - Harder you...? - Fall!
OK, lots of fine words.
translation.es: Sí. Bueno. Unas frases de esnob.

translation.en: Now, let's get ready!
May the best man win.
Three. Two. One.
Holmgang!
Bull's- eye!
Estate owner! Yeah!
Awesome!
It's you and me then.
All right.
Wow, you're so strong!
You think?
OK? Yes.
Kiss me.
